subject: Soccer
Disasters and Emergencies
lead_paragraph: The 390th "Old Firm" meeting of the Rangers and Celtics was preceded by a tribute to the 66 soccer supporters who were crushed to death in a stairway collapse at the old stadium 40 years ago.
snippet: The 390th "Old Firm" meeting of the Rangers and Celtics was preceded by a tribute to the 66 soccer supporters who were crushed to death in a stairway collapse at the old stadium 40 years ago.
